meanings.definition: A person who delivers a soliloquy.
meanings.sent1: The theater was filled with talented soliloquists.
meanings.sent2: The soliloquists captivated the audience with their powerful monologues.
meanings.sent3: The soliloquists decided to have a competition to see who could deliver the longest speech.
meanings.sent4: In the world of theater, soliloquists are like solo stars shining on stage.
meanings.sent5: The soliloquists' voices echoed through the empty theater, leaving a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: The act of delivering a soliloquy.
meanings.sent1: During the play, the soliloquists took turns speaking directly to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The soliloquists' performance was the highlight of the show.
meanings.sent3: The soliloquists' voices filled the room, creating a dramatic atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The soliloquists' words painted vivid pictures in the minds of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The soliloquists' delivery was so engaging that the audience was spellbound.
